policyDescription: This policy is designed to encourage and protect employees who report suspected violations of the law, company policies, or unethical behavior.

investigationProcess.initialAssessment: The initial report will be assessed to determine if it warrants a full investigation.
investigationProcess.fullInvestigation: If a full investigation is warranted, it will be conducted by an independent investigator.
investigationProcess.conclusionAndReporting: The findings of the investigation will be reported to the appropriate authorities.

training: All employees will receive annual training on the whistleblower policy.
